thread.title: Patriots troll Jets with butt fumble tweet (then delete it) - Patriots
thread.title_full: Patriots troll Jets with butt fumble tweet (then delete it) - Patriots

author: Chris Greenberg
title: Patriots troll Jets with butt fumble tweet (then delete it) - Patriots
text:
The New England Patriots’ official Twitter account seems to be doing its part to make sure nobody stops laughing at the New York Jets over the “butt fumble.”
Ahead of the AFC East rivals first meeting in 2015, the account shared a #ThrowbackThursday photo of the infamous gaffe.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Twitter/@Patriots After garnering media attention , the tweet was deleted .
It wasn’t the first time the Patriots’ Twitter account trolled the Jets this way. In October 2014, it shared a similar image of former Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez running into the ample posterior of teammate Brandon Moore during a November 2012 game against the Patriots.
#TBT to another #Patriots -Jets Thursday night game: pic.twitter.com/MRYi4bdqDa
— New England Patriots (@Patriots) October 16, 2014 Indianapolis Colts wide receiver Griff Whalen and safety Colt Anderson might want to stay off Twitter on Thursdays before any future matchup against the Patriots after their own recent slapstick miscue.
The Colts tried a unique formation on 4th down. It didn't work. #NEvsIND http://t.co/Eh0HXpFV00
— NFL (@NFL) October 19, 2015
